identity.mission: Create a travel-first marketplace that feels like a handcrafted journal, not a SaaS tool.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Editorial Print design with Modern App utility.
Emotion First: Every screen must evoke 'Discovery' or 'Nostalgia'.
Content is King: Products are stories, not just SKUs.
Texture over Gloss: Use grain and matte finishes, avoid shiny gradients.

heading.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use 'italic' variants for emphasis words.

accent.usage: Overlines, tags, technical details (e.g., Order IDs).

primary.description: Terracotta - Warm, earthy, energetic. Use for primary actions.

secondary.description: Sage Green - Natural, calming. Use for success states and secondary badges.

background.description: Warm Sand / Off-White. Avoid pure #FFFFFF for main background.

accent.description: Soft Gold. Use for highlights and 'memories'.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-primary/20 text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 border border-border/50
cards.dashboard: bg-white rounded-xl border border-border p-6 shadow-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-border bg-white/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

tech_stack.frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Lucide React, Sonner (Toast), Shadcn/UI

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Texture: Add a subtle noise overlay to the body background (opacity 0.03) to give a paper feel.
Spacing: Use 'p-8' or 'p-12' where you'd normally use 'p-4'. Luxury is space.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale on click. Cards should lift on hover.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
Dark Mode: While Light is primary, ensure Dark mode uses 'Zinc' grays (slate-900), not pure black.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lenis' and 'framer-motion' immediately. 2. Set up the font families in tailwind.config.js. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the smooth scroll wrapper. 4. Build the 'Hero' section using the 'hero_artisan' image with a parallax effect.
